Please which office is incharge of producing student Id cards?
You can issue your student Id card at the Library. make sure you go there with your school fees payment reciept, a doccument that identifies your nationality, could be your national ID card, passport, birth certificate or resident permit. the library is open today from 8:00 am to 5:30pm.
